DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the maximum tolerated dose and safety of CC-4047 (pomalidomide) given in combination with cisplatin and etoposide in patients with extensive disease small cell lung cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I/II Study to Determine the Maximum Tolerated Dose (MTD) and Safety of CC-4047 (Pomalidomide) Administered in Conjunction With Cisplatin and Etoposide
